page.title: 11Pets in Nether & Over Silton
page.content: Of those families surveyed only 20% did not possess a pet of some kind. Dogs and cats made up the most popular group,some of these being pedigree animals.One family kept German Shorthaired Pointer dogs and another Burmese cats.Some dogs were kept to work e.g.sheepdogs and some for companionship. Goldfish made up a popular group being kept mainly by children. We found individual households had amongst them a rabbit,a duck,a tortoise,a goat and a budgerigar. Tortoises are becoming increasingly rare as importing them into the country has been banned. One family had just lost a goldfinch which they had kept for 15 years. Three families kept ponies.
